sentences.sContent: After the first few shots, people started screaming.
sentences.sCn: 几声枪响过后，人们开始尖叫起来。

sentences.sContent: The children were screaming with laughter .
She was screaming her head off (= screaming a lot ) .
She began to scream blue murder (= scream very loudly ) .
He was dragged kicking and screaming to a nearby van.
sentences.sCn: 他又踢又叫着被拖到附近的一辆小货车上。
